mapper.insert: insert into tbl_opinion(user_id, opinion, createTime) values (#{user_id}, #{opinion}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: select o.id as opinionId, o.opinion, o.createTime, u.id as userId, u.account, u.nick_name from tbl_opinion o left join tbl_user u on o.user_id = u.id order by createTime desc limit #{skipCount}, #{pageSize}
